text: Haoyue: According to the instructions of the headquarters, this should be the information center, but why is there no one to guard it?
Rick: I did this. I was sent by the headquarters to help you secretly. I have set up a soundproof field here. Hurry up and hand over the information poison to me to complete the war with Zaun.....
Rick: Don't hesitate, this field won't last long.
Haoyue: You should be the manipulator behind the scenes. Only by killing you can let  this war end.
Rick: Is this the end of my dream? In the end, this world has not been purified.
Haoyue: You are wrong, this world is originally made of love, you just didn't see it with your heart.
